definition: to form/to organize/group/team/classifier for sets, series, groups of people, batteries
word/statement/speech/lyrics/CL:組|组[zu3],個|个[ge4]/a form of lyric poetry, flourishing in the Song dynasty 宋朝|宋朝[Song4 chao2]/CL:首[shou3]

sentences.english: He was pretty strong for his size.
sentences.chinese: 这组词的共同意思是“相当”。

sentences.english: All your writers do consent that ipse is he.
sentences.chinese: 这组词的共同意思是“同意”。

sentences.english: There are enough hotels…to suit any pocket.
sentences.chinese: 这组词都有“足够的”意思。

sentences.english: Mr. Tomkins…had a wonderful eye for the picturesque.
sentences.chinese: 这组词都有“极好的”意思。

sentences.english: When an upset was…inevitable, the horses slackened their pace.
sentences.chinese: 这组词的共同含义是“打翻”。

sentences.english: The keeper made a series of brilliant…saves.
sentences.chinese: 这组词的共同意思是“贮藏”。

sentences.english: Betty was beginning to pine and to yearn after Beuno.
sentences.chinese: 这组词的共同意思是“渴望”。

sentences.english: He saw his troops retreat from the field.
sentences.chinese: 这组词都有“撤退，离开”的意思。

sentences.english: As the spot grew larger, it resolved itself into constituents.
sentences.chinese: 这组词都可作“成分，要素”解。

definition: character with two or more readings
new character (in textbook)/character that is unfamiliar or not yet studied
pronunciation/literary (rather than colloquial) pronunciation of a Chinese character
component of a Chinese character (as the radical or the phonetic part)
part of speech (noun, verb, adjective etc)/lexical category
the final of a Chinese syllable (the component of a syllable remaining after removal of the initial consonant, if any, and the tone, e.g. the final of "niáng" is "iang")
word (general term including monosyllables through to short phrases)/term (e.g. technical term)/expression
